title: SAFE agreements (Simple Agreement for Future Equity)
dataVerified: Investor name, company, investment amount, valuation cap, discount
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake SAFE agreements (startup fraud). Domain binding verifies startup/platform. Tamper-evident investment terms. Conversion event verification. Cap table integrity. High-value convertible securities.
